place_description: Counter-serve bakery/cafe chain serving sandwiches, salads & more, known for its bread & free WiFi.

reviews_data.review_text: Employees are very welcoming, and polite.

Love how sides are included... I am not very adventurous so I always get the plain grilled cheese which isn't the best but my family enjoyed all the other options. They didn't have very many desserts by the end of the day, but that makes sense.
Salads with chicken have extremely small portions. You have to order "extra chicken" to get even close to an adequate amount.

They made a mistake and it was corrected, nobody is perfect I know , problem was solved asap, Jordan took care of my order, thank you so much, and I want to add that I was greeted at the door by a lady that works there also and she was holding the door for me and smiling, can't ask for more ... they definitely made everything right !
I love coming to this cafe! Everyone's so nice and they keep it so clean! Their employees helped me figure out which Pick 2 was perfect for me.

I did not know ordering food at this location came with sarcasm and rude service. I definitely did not expect to be greeted that way either. Martin ( the name of my greeter ) I believe is in train at this location to then run another due to a recent promotion. To which I can not fathom when his condescending tone with customers says everything but hospitable or professional. If I had know picking up a mobile order would cause so much stress to him. I would have simply cancelled. Amazing to think that you chose where you work but couldn't choose a better disposition. I hope you have a great day. I wish you a better service then what you provide me.

I was there to get my drink and the person who get my order she make my day with her attitude giving me a wonderful smile and excellent service the kind of person any company willing to have in their business no doubt it Thank you Euridices for your service.

I don't give many reviews on Google, but when I saw how kind everyone was and how clean this location was, I had to write a review. As soon as I came in, everyone had a smile on their face and welcomed me in. The ordering process was smooth, quick, and easy.  Everything on my order was correct the first time and there were no mistakes. I am very happy to have this location near to where I moved.
Clean, and friendly environment. Great food and service
Great panera to eat at, all workers were FANTASTIC. They engaged and helped me when there was tons of people waiting for their food. Overall was a great experience, can't wait to come again

ONLY visit this location if you want to deal with incompetence and racism. I mean how do you mess up ONE bagel  by giving me Asiago instead of cinnamon bagel. Then encounter a racist manager who automatically assume that you're being dishonest because of your race. I've giving multiple chances but I WILL SPEND MY money somewhere else and will be reaching out to the corporate office
The best Panera in Charlotte!
My favorite 2for: Frontega Chicken panini sandwich and cheddar broccoli soup. Spoon satisfying! Yum!
Staff was exceptional!!

I wanted to try a new location and I will not be coming back if I get the same cashier. She had long hair, no name tag, and was so rude. She looked like she would rather be somewhere else and she rolled her eyes at me when I asked a question about the menu. I got my drink and turned back because I thought she said something to me. She wasn't, she was talking to someone on the phone through her headphones. This is the first face you see when you walk in and she was on the phone talking. Unbelievable! That's not all. I came back to the front to grab a sweet before I left (the cookies are my favorite) and this same cashier was on what seemed to be a personal tablet. At the register, where everyone could see!! I don't think she even saw me because she was so focused on her tablet. I also noticed as I was eating that people would have to wait on her as she would step away from the register for long periods of time. Again, I didn't get a name because she didn't have a name tag on but I dined in today around 6pm. Everyone else on the staff was helpful and the food was delicious. It's sad how one employee can almost ruin the whole experience. I hope this employee is handled for a better future experience!
Excellent customer service.  Very clean and well maintained.  Wonderful coffee and atmosphere.
Fast and friendly. The building design is a little different but they work well with what they got.
This place was excellent!! The sandwich I had was very fresh and delicious! Great customer service also.

To the White lady who was working as a cashier today at 3:55 pm on March 12th, 2024. She seem to be so rude and entitled. You seem like one of the dirty Democrat wokey person. I'm not making $ 2 per hr like you so da treat your customers in a right way show some repsect.

Probably the saddest Panera I've ever been to. I literally get the same thing anytime I go to a Panera, pick 2 tomato soap and half grilled cheese.

Everything was sticky, floor, seats, tables, doors...everything! Serving size was about 1/2 what you normally get and a 2" chunk of bread. You can tell this is mostly a grub hub/order and pick up type of store.

Drive thru is closed and you have to order on your phone instead which is annoying but I get it. Was given the wrong drink and when I corrected them, they said I didn't order that. Then they proceeded to give me another wrong item that was clearly for the car behind me. My order wasn't that complicated, just two drinks, so not really sure what went wrong.
Great, friendly staff and service. The manager, Randi, is very helpful and kind. She is amazing and super sweet!!!!

1. Location is unclean and tables are filthy
2. Two items were missing from my order and had to be requested.
3. Bread was over cooked and not up to standards.
4. Cookie was hard enough to potentially chip a tooth.

Recommendation: Avoid. District manager needs to live at the restaurant for a month, train or rehire employees and get it up to Panera standards.

The morning staff were very professional and friendly. Staff Francina was amazing too..

I also enjoyed the breakfast to the fullest..
Needs a little up keep.
Love being able to work from Panera when I have to be out and about. It has a great atmosphere to set up in between meetings and get some work done.
It's a good location. Clean, efficient and the workers are helpful and friendly, so I'm not mad at thisl Panera.
First and last time.
Frequently out of ingredients and options
ordered delivery and there was a hair at the bottom of my soup. they only gave me broth as well, barely any chicken and noodle.

Very clean, plenty of parking, dining area was clean and friendly staff! Bakery items were nicely displayed and looked very fresh. Today I tried a value duet - tuna and tomato soup. Both were nicely presented. There is also a drive thru option here.

Lady at front was sniffling, probably was sick and shouldn't be working register. Half of the bagel bins were empty at 8am, order a cinnamon toast bagel, didn't tell us they didn't have it until after we paid....didn't offer a treat for not having it...guy ordered food 7 min after we did and got his breakfast sandwich made and cooked before our 2 bagels were sliced and toasted and the lady in the pic, I'm assuming was the manager was snickering about us asking. For a bagel she didn't have in stock. Do yourself a favor, go to Starbucks next door. We are from Birmingham, our Panera is open at 6am and fully stocked.
Poor customer service

I love to go to this Panera to work and get soup or sandwiches. It's my favorite of all the Paneras in Charlotte - almost never crowded, quick service and of course, great Panera food. Highly recommend.

Once again this store has one kind of bagel and it's not even 930. Chocolate chip to boot who wants a breakfast sandwich on a chocolate chip bagel?! Get your act together. It's not the first time this has happened
I visit here every day for lunch. I love this place. Just right across the street from my office
I like Tyvola Panera. But so frustrating the sight will let you order items that you pull up to pick up and they don't have them.  Wasted trip had to make a concession

I buy the same thing all of the time, Toasted Frontega Chicken. It seems that everyone doesn't follow the same instructions on making the sandwich. The sandwich was fresh but didn't taste like it should.

Love this Panera bread, i stop in almost daily on my way to work to get my sip club beverage that I order ahead on the app and its always ready for me to run in and pick up. The staff is friendly and prompt. Smooth experience.
Sandwich was made sloppy everything was stacked in the middle of the bread to much sauce
Absolut leckeres Essen, sehr europaisch

Place was very unclean, sticky floor and piled up dishes not picked up for cleaning. Everything looked out of ordered. Worst one I've ever visited.  OTHERS are always clean. I certainly would not dine in.
Good food and location.

I love that this location has a drive thru window and the customer service was great. I had an issue the first time with bruised bananas, but that was resolved, and all of the food was fresh this second time around.

panera decided to take away the drive through option at this location? they turned the panera drive through into a mobile pick up only lane, not only is this inconvenient but it's incredibly unsafe. instead of being able to go to a drive through in a hurry, you now have to either 1: go inside of the store or 2: pull over and order on their mobile app or attempt to do it while driving. We asked one of the employees why they made this change (not their fault obviously) and her response was "supposed to be more convenient"  . Who's gonna tell 'em?

Why is this location allowed to be trash and remain this way? So this visit, as I always get the same thing from Panera, I ordered a  Mediterranean sandwich and broccoli and cheddar soup. I visit numerous Panera breads due to work, and this one always fails.
If you don't have all the ingredients of the meal, it can simply be expressed. Don't just take it upon yourself to add a bag of chips to make up for it. Let somebody know so I can decide for myself what I wish to do.
I'm not even going to go too deep into the well deserved complaints but really... get this location together

Drive thru was quick but my souffle was cold. So now I have to waste time going back to the store for hot food.

When I told the girl at the counter that my food was cold she told me to use the microwave behind me. I don't want to use the microwave, I don't want to heat up my own food, I just wanted a break that's why I went to a restaurant. There's no break for mommies not even when ordering take out.

Just ate at Panera today, we were pressed for time and it was a quick lunch! Food was great. However I was in a rush to get out of there and left my purse. I didn't realize this til I was back at work and called about 30 mins later. Jordan, the manager, found it hanging on the back of a chair and secured it so I could go back and grab it after work. The food was great, but I appreciate Jordan and his team even more. I'm flying back to AZ tomorrow and so glad I got my drivers license back along with everything else. Thanks again Jordan and Panera!!

Muy buenas ensaladas y sopas. Ambiente agradable y buena atencion, tuvimos un incidente en los kioskos donde se ordena electronicamente y nos cobraron doble por el pedido, recomiendo ordenar directamente en el counter.
Love this place! They know exactly how to make my geek salad!!
This is hands-down the SLOWEST location on earth!!!!!
This is hand-down THE SLOWEST Panera on earth!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Did you know that Panera Bread gives 3rd party delivery drivers an empty cup to fill up for their customers that order through apps??? I didn't until today. (I was told by a Panera employee)

Delivery drivers are NOT food service workers. They are there to transport an item from one place to another. Why is Panera Bread making them handle/prepare consumables (food) with unclean hands??

I'll never order again.

Oh yeah, they got my order wrong. No hummus in my Mediterranean bowl and no drink. This place is trifling at best.
Quick service and quality food.
Expensive entrees that are delicious are worth it..expensive average tasting entrees not so much...be advised: portions are kid-sized
Terrible service and incompetent workers. Avoid this place and go to the Chipotle next store.
Ordered a Toasted Frontega Chicken sandwich and some soup. Was pretty disappointed for $30.
Food was truly fresh. No complaints. Cashier was from the D. She was great. Very helpful.
We like Panera and expected this one to be as good as the others. We were disappointed. It wasn't clean. The food was mediocre. The service was sub-par.
The food here is always so good.
Loved it
Most of the time I come here my order is wrong
Breakfast on the beautiful morning of Saturday in Panera Bread  &

Two staff members had a conversation at the counter in front of me but didn't greet me - I just stood there patiently at the counter waiting to be acknowledged for 5 mins, and then one walked away with the cash draw (I'm assuming the manager) and the other eventually came back and said hello, but that she couldn't ring me up because the other just took her draw and prompted me to use the kiosk. She was nice enough about it. This place could SERIOUSLY use a deep cleaning. It smells disgusting like old mop water and is dirty - not a good feel when you're trying to eat. They should step their game up, this is a pretty nice area but they don't meet the standard most of us customers are expecting. The only reason I'm giving 2 stars instead of 1 is because the cooks seemed nice.
Always great

They advertised autumn squash soup is back!!....sold out. Sold me Ice Tea only to fill up and find out machine broken. I ordered chicken avocado sandwich,  came with 1/3 of the chicken pictured in menu. I ordered at the kiosk only to have order lost. Dirty tables everywhere.  Not friendly staff. Just a bad restaurant.
Every order I've placed here has had something missing. Every time.

Cashier at the Drive through window proceeded to text when the order was ready to go and instead of doing the hand off. When water bottle was not given during handoff cashier proceeded to get it, come back, sat it down, texted for 2 minutes and then handed it off. 12/1/22 6:20 PM for reference.
So slow! I waited in line for almost 40 minutes, it was insane.
Too slow
It is very good place to have breakfast and Donna she is very friendly women and she explains very well about food item .

First time at this location (we live in SC and just got off of a flight) and we were slightly disappointed. When we walked in there was a line but the cashier seem to be just standing there. No smile, no greeting, nothing.  We decided to order from the kiosk which was easy to navigate. Once we placed our order I waited to hear my name to be called. There were several people standing at the pick up window so I stood with them waiting. The kitchen was very busy but well run by a gentleman with a beard. He was putting orders up as they were being made. Sadly he had to stop what he was doing to tell the cashier to stop standing around and clean tables on her down time. She pushed through the crowd without saying anything and the look on her face made it seem like she did not want to work there. She just stood at the pick up window tapping her finger nails on the counter. A few people approached and tried to ask her a question, she just shrugged and said she didn't know. Look, if you hate your job, I get it but at least act polite to your customers. Big shout out to the kitchen staff for being hit with 2 teams and still getting orders out. Our food was awesome and correct.

Poorly operated around 4 p.m. to 6 p.m.
**Find a new manager**
Stopped by to buy a dozen bagels. They had like 5 bagels on the shelf.... Waste of time
We loved our soup!

I enjoy going to this Panera almost every day for coffee and sometimes breakfast on my way to work. They just started opening at 6 which is even better for my morning routine. The only critique I have is that depending who is working the drive thru: your iced or hot coffee will either be mixed for you with your cream and sugar etc ready to go in your car... or you will be handed a palm full of stuff and a full coffee cup. This is not conducive to tidy cars with no where to cleanly discard used packets of sugar or cream cups with no bag for trash since you only ordered a cup. Or if there is no room in your cup for add ins you have to find a way to pour some out. It would be nice to have a standard of mixing the coffee before it goes through the window - or at least consistently not mixing it so I know what I'm signing up for instead of an unpleasant surprise!

I somehow unclicked the turkey on my sandwich during my online order. Instead of them just making the sandwich, they waited until I arrived to confirm. I really appreciated the care to fix my mistake.

I joined the unlimited sip club, free until Halloween and have visited this location a few times. My order is never completely accurate. They don't really have sweet tea but it's on the menu - you must add your own sweeteners which doesn't work well for iced tea. I don't like that the duets mostly come with tomato soup (although this is a corporate decision). My cookies never look like the pics. I had to return a soup because it was only broth. For the prices, the service experience should be better. On the bright side, the fountain ginger ale is the best.

I understand this is a busy location but I've never had an order that wasn't at least 10-15 minutes late when I do 'rapid' order pickup.

Honestly if it wasn't the closest breakfast spot for me I would never go.
Food is usually on par with what to expect with Panera which is good
very good
Okay service and they never called out the order. Food was good.
Good food
Everything you'd expect from a Panera Bread!
Fast and pleasant service
Jordan and Ramone are awesome.  I got a strawberry poppy seed chicken salad and it didn't have the chicken on it.  They took care of it.  Great customer service.  Thanks so much to both of them
Mediocre food, charged twice because the person taking the order provided me incorrect information on an item. Paid $50 for a $50 meal with no apologies
It was very busy with a tennis tournament in town, but they go out food out quickly and we're friendly. The food was fresh and made well!

I love Panera Bread,their ingredients are fresh and clean,the food is so delicious my favorite go to place for lunch.The service is rather quick most days but  @ lunch time it's sometimes a short wait.
Waited over half hour for a order that never came they kept making excuses as to why

I had a great experience at this Panera location!  Went through the drive thru and ordered a new type of drink.  When I got to the window Pazzy was awesome.  She asked if I had tried any of these new drinks.  When I responded with a no, she was kind enough to give me a little taste test.  Super thoughtful and great service.  Thank you, Pazzy!
Love the salads.
Haven't been to Panera in quite some time, so not sure when the ordering kiosks became a thing (COVID?). Either way, it makes ordering easy...in and out.
I have never had a bad meal from Panera. My favorite is the Turkey chili on a cold day!!
Better coffee than Starbucks
Wonderful salad, service and staff.

Sheilah went far and beyond to make sure my order was right and ready in time. It's been a long time since my last visit to this location which is not far away from our office. I will definitely come back more often. Thank you.
Staff are great and full of smiles! Thanks y'all!
u

Good, healthy food, and nice to be able to easily pick up an order and bring it home.  However, we have had some issues with the orders not being correct in the past, or missing some bread that should come with our orders.
Food was great, staff was super nice.
Clean, friendly personal, good food
The delivery  food  is ready when you arrive
El espacio mas tranquilo para disfruta una deliciosa comida
Nice employees, clean bathroom and accurate order, thank you!
Always fresh

Great costumer service!,chase one of the managers at this location is ALWAYS respectful and helpful , whenever my order is wrong or out of stock he makes sure my order get taken care of and goes an extra mile, thank you chase for great service!
The Best Soups and Grill Cheese Sandwiches

Ordered one item for pick up online they text me saying the order is ready and then tell me it was going to be 5 minutes. Some people have to be at work if the order is not ready don't advise the customer it is.

New establishment, very clean huge plus very friendly crew food super fresh great service consistently. Every time I've visited rather drive thru crib side or dine in the service has been great no complaints at this location
too expensive
Best tea and lemon cookies

Went through the drive-thru at a very slow time of day (8:30 a.m. on a Sunday morning) and ordered a bagel with steak and cheese. When I opened the sandwich I found it was a steak and egg bagel. I had to wait a long time to get back to the service window, and when I said that I had ordered a steak and cheese bagel and instead received a steak and egg bagel, her annoyed question was "did it not have cheese?" I told her that I was unable to eat eggs, and again put out, she directed me to the parking spots. I finally have (most of) a steak and cheese bagel after 22 minutes of waiting.
Drive thru line with 1 person in front of us takes 20 minutes? Worst service ever and employees were rude about the wait time
Stopped in here for a couple of hours to work via the free WiFi. Had a coffee and the broccoli-cheddar soup in a bread bowl. Everything was good. Service was fast and friendly.

I came to this location about two days ago, ordered through the drive through and waited outside for my food. There was a hiccup and I ended up waiting a bit for my food, however, I spoke to Jess at this location and she made it right. She ensured I got my order immediately, gave me two pastries, and told me to come back and ask for her and she would take care of my order for me. I came back today, and Jess took care of my order. Very impressed with the service here at this location!
Wait 35 min for my lunch late going back to work
This location is 95% effective regarding customer service. The level of professionalism exceed standards in today's society.
Great coffee!!
Food was bland, even by Panera standards.
Open-concept dining room, love the coffee and baked goods.
Such weird hours and not at all convenient
Very slow. Fair customer service
Great place for fresh soups, salads and sandwiches.

What can I say? It's Panera Bread. Everything was delicious.  I LOVE the oatmeal!! I was out of town with my daughter and grandson and this was our breakfast stop. Mask was not required and we had dine-in.
Got notification that meal was ready when in fact it was not. Waited on remaining piece and when I asked about it found it had been sitting around with nobody having thought to bring it to me
Fix your hrs as they are wrong! You close at 2 not 3 on a Sunday.

Went through the drive through for lunch with a coworker today 5/21 before noon. We ordered a full Mediterranean veggie sandwich with no cheese and a full smokehouse BBQ bacon sandwich with a tea. To our unfortunate surprise we received the tea, a cup of broccoli cheddar soup and 1/2 chicken salad. Obviously this was not what we paid for, and then the order they gave us was also missing items. Being our lunch break we did not have time to return to the store.
Great service and space.
Another great meal from a fast and friendly staff!
Closed today for no reason
The best broccoli and cheese soup with a salad always makes my day
It is just OK.  Nothing compared with the Southpark store or the Providence Rd store.  The service here is not up to par.  Disappointing.
Great place eat soup was hot fast and friendly service. I would eat there again enjoyed it.
Love the breakfast sandwiches
Very polite staff
They forgot my bowl of chicken teriyaki
Alway good
They were great
Convenient location; air will definitely make you eat quickly
Nice place
Order was correct and ready to go for pickup and that Mac n Cheese is always my favorite!
I love how clean all the food tastes and the amazing healthier options. Very clean, fast and friendly service.
Panera is a place to go when you want something convenient. Their sandwiches are great but in general their bagels and such are overpriced.

This location is getting a little sloppy. This morning, they were out of muffins and spinach artichoke souffles by 7:30 AM. HOW? Also, depending on who's working when I order an iced coffee, I may have to make it myself. If they don't want to, they'll hand you coffee on ice with cream and sugar in a bag. How is the sugar going to dissolve when it's cold? They are also not the friendliest staff overall.
Love! Fast friendly and FRESH!
Great bake goods & sandwiches.
Best bang for ya buck

I go here at least twice a week and they are always on point! Food is very hot and fresh every time. They recognize me with my custom order and they make the ordering process so easy. My order is always correct. One of the only Panera's with a drive thru. Staff is awesome, keep up the great work!!

I really can't stand this Panera. They're always out of stuff. I went in at 9:30 this morning and they only had one plain bagel, two cinnamon crunch bagels, and a few other assortments. On top of that, their bagels don't even taste that great. I ordered coffee; they didn't have any regular sugar only sugar in the raw.

This issue happens on a regular basis. I went there for lunch one day, tried to order a salad, they were out of romaine lettuce! A lot of people are still working from home and there are two new apartment complexes that were just built. How are they going to service the extra amount of customers if they can't even keep enough inventory now. I get so aggravated with them im not going back there again. I'll either go to one near my house or to the store on S. Tryon.
Great fresh food

The staff needs to work on saying hello to customers. This location has kiosks for you to place your order take a buzzer and then sit down. The problem I had is that there was staff that was there that walking around and did not acknowledge my presence, did not tell me that I needed to use the kiosk, and did not tell me that they weren't running the register. I don't mind using kiosk. I don't mind if you're busy, but at 7:05 a.m. you can say good morning. At 7:05 a.m. you can say to a customer please use the kiosk and we will bring your order out. At 7:05 a.m. you should also have a better attitude when it comes to the customers that are curbside pickup and not complain openly about them. This location lacks professionalism. The food was good, the presentation was great, and the location is clean, but the staff is not professional.
Please extend your closing time to 10pm or 8pm at the least.

I gave it one star because they don't have ranch dressing. That's like not having sweet tea in the South... totally ruined my salad because I don't like ANY of their dressings. I'll be back when they have ranch dressing as an option.
Love this bakery. As a plus here you can find something for lunch (like salads or sandwiches).
Chicken chibatta was amazing!
Cinnamon crunch bagel OMG HAZEL NUT CREAM OMGG
Always deliver super quickly and always get the order right!
7:30am and there are only about a dozen bagels left. This location is constantly running out and not keeping up with the demand in the location.
Sandwich barely had any ingredients on it,  purchased a whole sandwich but only recieved a half sandwich.  Apples aren't washed,  had a white sticky film on it.  Never going there again!

We put in a 10-person to-go order in the middle of lunchtime (because the restaurant we had ordered from did not show up). The manager turned our order around in about 15 minutes, and saved our lunch meeting! Yay Panera!
Drive thru workers need training.
Food was good and came out quick.  Dining room is very small and hard to find a seat during peak times.
The food is real good. I tried the M ac & Cheese for the first time and it was awesome!
Love the soups here and customer service
Love the location

Panera is a great restaurant and this location delivered on the quality expected. I gave it four stars because of the limited size and the limited parking.

This location is about one third the size of a normal Panera, so be prepared that seating is limited. With the amount of offices around this location it seems to cater to the to-go orders instead of people dining-in. To accommodate the to-go portion they have about 10 parking spaces reserved up front.

They've got the food preparation and to-go portion managed well, however, because of the limited seating people seem to walk around looking for a place to sit. Not a big deal because of how good the food is but just something to be aware of. During the warmer weather they accommodate for the limited seating with outdoor seating.

Mystery egg on bagel... Not sure where it came from but definitely not from a farm chicken... Square scrambled egg... Bacon seemed real. Cream cheese was more like a runny salad dressing in prepackaged cup. Hot chocolate was watery. Not pleased with breakfast... Worse than suffering through fast food joint.

Just your average Panera, but there is one HUGE issue here. It is surrounded by business and at lunchtime it can be a nightmare Monday through Friday trying to find a seat. Panera definitely should have went with a little more square footage. Otherwise, it's your typical Panera... expensive but somewhat healthy.
Very courteous and expedious with my order +Sandwich(s) were superb :)

I've had several not so pleasant experiences at this location (i.e raw chicken) but Taylor, one of the managers, made it so much better!! She is incredibly kind and understanding! She is a prefect example of leadership! Amazing job Taylor!! -Mia
Nice friendly people very good
Standard Panera, food is good and service is average. Like all you could make it yourself cheaper but it is easier and tasty to just buy it already done.
The chicken noodle soap I had was okay, not really much to it. Store was out of all sides and bread except for bags of chips.
Great food
Su atencion.calida y muy eficientes
Clean and tasty
Great food, great customer service, all my needs were met.
Excellent young lady took my order.  She was very helpful and smiled
Soup order was wrong, grilled cheese wasn't grilled.

I go here alot. This place does not disappoint. They are always super helpful. There was a problem with their machines/registers when I was there last. Over and over they apologized for the computer problems. I waited until the computers were fixed, and the manager bought my lunch for my patience. She did not need to do that, but that just shows the level of customer service.
This Panera bread was super close to the hotel I was staying at. It had a neat modern kiosk ordering system that I haven't seen as a lot of Panera breads
I was lucky enough to have Kim take my order at the drive thru at this location - she made my day!
Great food and excellent customer service.
Ordered one of the souffles late in the morning so they've been sitting there for a little while shell was a bit tough and chewy
Food is delicious
Great food and service
It's...Panera.

They must pay for all the "Local Guide" reviews.

How can you mess up coffee? And, how do you not have creamer out near the coffee at 6:30am when people need coffee? Had to stand at the window to their kitchen to beg for creamer this morning. She hands me four small creamers like you get at some fast food place.

The staff are too busy talking to each other to actually offer good service. Top it off, coffee tastes so bad (stale, burnt, foul). Frequent inaccurate orders and SLOW service on several visits. Other locations aren't too bad, but this location is HORRIBLE.
Great and friendly people work there.

Decent-- most of the time, my order is fine. But they run out of a lot of food pretty frequently. Beware of Friday mornings because you likely won't be able to get bagels! I've tried a number of times, including ordering well in advance through the app, but they run out every time. I've also had 2 occasions now where my order was never processed, despite ordering with the app. The staff is friendly though, it just seems like their internal order management is chaotic, causing lost orders and a chronic lack of certain foods.
They have good food ,  clean atmosphere and great service

They were out of french onion soup by 5 in the afternoon. Ordered the Green goddess salad and they forgot to give me the dressing. I didn't want to drive 20 minutes back. I just used a dressing at home.
panera bread was good
Food is always yummy as expected with Panera! Service is a hit or miss though- either it's super fast or I wait 15+ min for my order.
Basic panera great staff quick service
I just order chipotle chicken avocado melt and am disappointed I paid for extra avocado  I don't see anything
I visited this location on 09/17 my bagel was cut complete wrong and the cashier attitude was horrible.
Expensive but good food.
They have the best customer service
I normally hit the drive thru on the way to work, but in Sept 10 the drive thru wasn't open and I had to go inside. That was very inconvenient especially since the service is slower inside.

Thankful for the new location - front cashier staff person was super friendly.  I think in general Panera could do a bit more refreshing of their display as afternoon hits. They always look "shopped out" after the morning rush. Love that they display the calories on everything and their iced coffee offerings are amazing. Also offering almond milk now so yay!
Good

I live right behind this Panera and given them 1 too many chances to be polite and make up for their mistakes. Often they are not polite and multiple times my order has been incorrect. Today was the icing on the cake, when I didn't receive my order correctly and there was also burnt coal in my bag. Will not be going back.

Any place where I can get delicious soup and salad without having to get out of my car (due to their efficient drive-thru window) is solid in my book. The abundant outdoor seating is also a plus for this location if you're sitting down to eat. If this review was helpful, please consider liking.
Not for human consumption
Good place to eat. A variety of sandwiches, salads, pastries, and cookies, also they have a breakfast menu that is good too. You always leave feeling healthy
My first Panera Bread experience and at this point my last. 11.14 for a salad that's not even full. There is more chicken and Avocado than salad

Food is typically good... when they have the item available. They are always running out of bagels, chips, smoothies, basically anything on their menu. Not sure how management has not figured out inventory management yet...
Pretty good food, though the customer service was a little shaky

This is now the second time that my order has been completely wrong or items have been left out from the pick up station. The items were checked off on the side of the bag, but clearly no one looked inside the bag because they were not in there. Also, when I tried to call the phone rang so many times, and we kept getting hung up on, until finally an associate answered and we heard the manager say in the background "don't pick up the phone during lunch". Our office is very close to this location so we often order for lunch or catering. Last time our catering order was over 1 hour late with no apology or compensation. We will NOT be returning.
I don't know how you guys ended up with a 3.8 rating this is definitely a 5.0 star deal was fast and professional and friendly great job guys keep up the good work

Bad service on weekends.. Ordered Bagels from mobile app. When I went to pick up I was told that the bagels that I ordered were not there.

Reason: They normally restock whenever bagels go out of stock. Since the weekend is slow, they decided not to restock.

Either they should mention that bagels were out of stock on the mobile app (or) restock bagels and honor my order.

Bad customer experience.
Bad customer service in this location

The ABSOLUTE worst service on the weekends! I don't know who is running this place but it is giving Panera Bread a bad reputation. I went Saturday morning and ordered the bacon, egg and cheese, which comes on a soft bread but they were out and did not tell me and put it on a ciabatta, which is hard. Had they asked I would have requested plain white bread. I went this afternoon and ordered a TOASTED Tuscan chicken sandwich and the sandwich was not toasted. I called on both days and on Saturday the manager told me that the cashier doesn't see the picture outside to know what the sandwich comes on and picked ciabatta because it is the first one listed AFTER telling me they were out of the bread it comes on. Called twice today to speak to a manager and the phone rang and rang and rang! NEVER visiting this one again.

Nice experience. My boyfriend and I had a smoked turkey and havarty sandwich and a bowl of broccoli cheddar soup to split. It was very good. It was about $15, which is a little on the high side for us, but since we split it, it wasn't too bad. The bread was so good. Some of the best bread we have had in a long time. The turkey was really good, not your typical lunch meat, it looked and tasted like a whole turkey breast that was shaved into sandwich meat.

The service was good. We went on a Saturday, but I was the only one in the restaurant. The cashier was very friendly and welcoming. She didn't pressure me at all and allowed me to take my time reading the menu and answered my questions. All the rest of the staff was great, and my food was made in a timely and professional manner.
Great food, especially the breakfast, the free pastries are good(cookies )
Nice new best and clean
Solid
Good.
cashier didn't put order in correctly so missed out on what we wanted.  food she did get right was good and it was put together quickly but still missed the soup

Service here was not good. No one was at the counter to take orders for a long time. The place was dirty and has trash on the floor/tables. Its also very small. The drink machine had to be replenished and it took the staff more than 30 minutes to do so (green tea machine). We also went when it was slow, there was only about 5 other people at the restaurant, which had all gotten their orders before us arriving.
Service and food was great
Great food as always

Decided to eat there for lunch today.  Went through the drive thru and wasted a full $16 dollars and half my lunch hour.  Sandwich seemed slapped together and service was rushed.  Provided my panera number to use my pick two and cashier didn't even apply it.  Pictures are attached.
You pick two! Need to stock up on bakery sweets for afternoon guest like me. I travel often and oftentimes when I stop in for a late afternoon snack, 85% of the sweets are out! Bummer!
The service was spot on
Wat more can i say
Excellent customer service very clean and neat warm and friendly staff!
Love the sandwiches
Yum yum
Clean place with good food & great service
Good foods and bakery. Mostly, I ordered online with rapid pick up, so far so good.
So good! Get the Chipotle chicken avacado sandwich  so good!
Great staff and well run
Nice and clean
Tasty breakfast sandwhich
Service was great but they was out of mac n cheese
Wonderful food, as usual! Fast service, too.
Enjoy food and friendly employees.
They have a really good steak, egg and cheese sandwich!
Always great service and food
Soup is sad
Had a breakfast meeting and then stuck around for their French Onion soup.  Yum!
I  this place
Very very good
Excellent souflets, better than other Panera's
Awesome!
Good place  for my wife to pick up breakfast on her way to work.
Very good!!!

The worst Panera I've been to. We live in the neighborhood right behind it, so, because of sheer convenience we have given this location several chances. Something in our order has been incorrect on every single visit. Portions are not consistent. Staff and management are apathetic. We will drive 4 miles down Tryon from now on to the Whitehall location and save ourselves the frustration.
